680210.name: Flix And Chill 2: Millennials Soundtrack
680210.description:
Flix And Chills 2: Millennials Soundtrack

Artist: Joakim Karud

Track 1: Clouds 3:34
Track 2: Twerk 2:54
Track 3: Classic 3:50
Track 4: Search 3:28
Track 5: Flix And Chill 3:30

Kick back and enjoy the "Chill" in Flix and Chill with the soundtrack to Flix and Chill 2: Millennials! With 5 chilled out songs by the talented Joakim Karud (musician for many vlogs including Casey Neistat), you'll be feeling the good vibes of snuggling up to that special someone and watching some Flix.

英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
